Method.name: CreateProjection
Method.Implementation: quit ##class(Installer).Install()

Method.name: RemoveProjection
Method.Implementation: quit ##class(Installer).Uninstall()

Method.name: SetLogLevel
Method.Description: Sets the log level verbosity used to display the info. Ranging from 1 to 2, greater provides more detailed info.

Method.name: GetLogLevel
Method.Description: Gets the current configured log level.
Method.Implementation: return $get(^Port.Configuration("general.logLevel"), 0)

Method.name: SetPrimaryWorkspace
Method.Description: Sets the primary path where the project should be exported. This can be overwritten by SetCustomWorkspace.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("source.path") = $select(newWorkspace = "" : "/CacheProjects/{NAMESPACE}/{PROJECT}", 1: newWorkspace)

Method.name: GetWorkspace
Method.Description: Resolves any placeholders and gets the precise path for the specified project. This priorizes the custom workspace and falls back to the primary.

Method.name: EnableAutoExportXML
Method.Description: Generates and export a XML project whenever a item is saved. This is useful for keeping the project XML always up-to-date.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("xml.autoexport") = 1

Method.name: DisableAutoExportXML
Method.Description: Disables the generation of the project XML file.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("xml.autoexport") = 0

Method.name: IsAutoExportXMLEnabled
Method.Description: Returns if project XML generation is enabled.
Method.Implementation: return ($get(^Port.Configuration("xml.autoexport")) = 1)

Method.name: SetTestPath
Method.Description: Relative to it's project. Sets the path where test cases should be exported.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("test.path") = $select(newPath = "" : "tests/cls", 1: newPath)

Method.name: GetTestPath
Method.Description: Retrives the resolved path where tests are being exported.

Method.name: EnableTestOnDemand
Method.Description: Allows Port to run matching test cases whenever the match is compiled.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("test.ondemand") = 1

Method.name: DisableTestOnDemand
Method.Description: Prevents Port from running test cases automatically.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("test.ondemand") = 0

Method.name: IsTestOnDemandEnabled
Method.Description: Retrieves if Port is configured to run test cases automatically.
Method.Implementation: return ($get(^Port.Configuration("test.ondemand")) = 1)

Method.name: SetTestClassPrefix
Method.Description: Sets the prefix used to match against the implementation classe.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("test.prefix") = $select(newPrefix = "" : "UnitTest", 1: newPrefix)

Method.name: GetTestClassPrefix
Method.Description: Gets the associated test prefix.
Method.Implementation: return $get(^Port.Configuration("test.prefix"))

Method.name: SetCustomWorkspace
Method.Description: Defines a custom workspace, a path where a single project should be exported. This configuration ovewrites the primary workspace.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("workspace.project", projectName) = path return $$$OK

Method.name: GetCustomWorkspace
Method.Description: Retrieves the resolved workspace path for the provided project. Returns empty if there's none.
Method.Implementation: set customWorkspace = $get(^Port.Configuration("workspace.project", projectName)) return ..RewritePlaceHolders(customWorkspace, projectName, $lb("{NAMESPACE}","{INSTALLDIR}","{PROJECT}","{USERNAME}"))

Method.name: HasCustomWorkspace
Method.Description: Returns if the project has a custom workspace.
Method.Implementation: return (..GetCustomWorkspace(projectName) '= "")

Method.name: RemoveCustomWorkspace
Method.Description: Removes the custom workspace from the project provided, which also resets it back to using the primary.
Method.Implementation: kill ^Port.Configuration("workspace.project", projectName)

Method.name: Uninstall
Method.Description: Remove all Port configurations. This will not erase project logs.
Method.Implementation: kill ^Port.Configuration return $$$OK

Method.name: RegisterExtendedHooks
Method.Description: Defines a class used to handle source control hooks after Port execution.

Method.name: GetInputCharset
Method.Description: Get the charset to be used when saving a document that has the provided extension. Defaults to "UTF8".
Method.Implementation: return $get(^Port.Configuration("source.charset.input", $$$ucase(extension)), "UTF8")

Method.name: GetOutputCharset
Method.Description: Get the charset to be used when retrieving a document that has the provided extension. Defaults to "UTF8".
Method.Implementation: return $get(^Port.Configuration("source.charset.output", $$$ucase(extension)), "UTF8")

Method.name: SetInputCharset
Method.Description: Set the character set to be used when saving a document with the provided extension.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("source.charset.input", $$$ucase(extension)) = charset return $$$OK

Method.name: SetOutputCharset
Method.Description: Set the character set to be used when retrieving a document with the provided extension.
Method.Implementation: set ^Port.Configuration("source.charset.output", $$$ucase(extension)) = charset return $$$OK

Method.name: GetExtendedHooksImplementer
Method.Implementation: return $get(^Port.Configuration("source.hooks.custom"))

Method.name: SetTestFormat
Method.Description: Defines which format the Port should for running unit test. When "XML" is selected, Port will export test classes as xml.
Method.Implementation: set type = $$$ucase(type) if '$lf($lb("UDL", "XML"), type) quit set ^Port.Configuration("test.format") = type

Method.name: GetTestFormat
Method.Description: Returns the selected test format. It can be "UDL" or "XML".
Method.Implementation: return $get(^Port.Configuration("test.format"), "XML")

Method.name: RewritePlaceHolders
Method.Implementation:
if '$data(params) set params = "" set translatedPath = basePath #define RewriteIfPathContains(%expression, %replacement) if ($lv(allowedPlaceholders) && $lf(allowedPlaceholders, %expression)) || (allowedPlaceholders = "*") set translatedPath = $select(translatedPath [ %expression : $replace(translatedPath, %expression, %replacement), 1: translatedPath)
set installDirectory = $System.Util.InstallDirectory() set installDirectory = $extract(installDirectory, 1, $length(installDirectory) - 1) $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{NAMESPACE}", $namespace) $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{INSTALLDIR}", installDirectory) $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{USERNAME}", $username) $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{EXPORTPATH}", ..GetWorkspace()) $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{FULLEXPORTPATH}", ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename(..GetWorkspace())) $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{SLASH}", $select($$$isWINDOWS: "\", 1: "/")) $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{PROJECT}", projectName)
if params { for i=1:1:params $$$RewriteIfPathContains("{P"_i_"}", params(i)) } return translatedPath

Method.name: Uninstall
Install
CreateGlobalMapping
RemoveGlobalMapping
CreateMessageDictionary
Method.Implementation:
do %code.WriteLine(" k ^CacheMsg(""Port Errors""),^CacheMsgNames(""Port Errors"")") do %code.WriteLine(" k ^CacheMsg(""Port Log Messages""), ^CacheMsgNames(""Port Log Messages"")") do %code.WriteLine(" k ^CacheMsg(""Port Menu Labels""), ^CacheMsgNames(""Port Menu Labels"")") do %code.WriteLine(" k ^CacheMsg(""Port Context Menu Labels""), ^CacheMsgNames(""Port Context Menu Labels"")")
set XDatas = %compiledclass.XDatas
for i=1:1:XDatas.Count() { set XDataId = $$$quote(%compiledclass.Name_"||"_XDatas.GetAt(i).Name) do %code.WriteLine(" set localeXData = ##class(%Dictionary.CompiledXData).%OpenId("_XDataId_").Data") do %code.WriteLine(" set tmpFilename = ##class(%File).TempFilename(""xml"")") do %code.WriteLine(" set file = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New()") do %code.WriteLine(" set file.TranslateTable = ""UTF8""") do %code.WriteLine(" $$$QuitOnError(file.LinkToFile(tmpFilename))") do %code.WriteLine(" $$$QuitOnError(file.CopyFrom(localeXData))") do %code.WriteLine(" $$$QuitOnError(file.%Save())") do %code.WriteLine(" $$$QuitOnError(##class(%MessageDictionary).Import(tmpFilename))") do %code.WriteLine(" do ##class(%File).Delete(tmpFilename)") do %code.WriteLine(" set (localXData, tmpFilename, file) = """"") } do %code.WriteLine(" set io = $io") do %code.WriteLine(" open $$$NULL") do %code.WriteLine(" use $$$NULL") do %code.WriteLine(" set sc = ##class(%MessageDictionary).GenerateInclude(""portmd"",,,""Port Errors,Port Log Messages,Port Menu Labels,Port Context Menu Labels"")") do %code.WriteLine(" use io") do %code.WriteLine(" close $$$NULL") do %code.WriteLine(" quit sc")

Method.name: %OnNew
Log
Method.Implementation: if ..Silent || (..LogLevel < messageLogLevel) return "" if '$data(params) set params = 0 set formattedParams = 0 for i=1:1:params { set formattedParams = $increment(formattedParams) set formattedParams(formattedParams) = $$$FormatMessage($$$SessionLanguage, "Port Log Messages", params(i), params(i)) } set msg = $$$FormatMsg("Port Log Messages", messageCode, formattedParams...) if messageCode '= $$$Done && ((messageCode '= $$$Failed) && (messageCode '= $$$UpToDate)) set msg = "[Port] "_msg return msg

Method.name: LogLine
Method.Implementation: if ..Silent || (..LogLevel < messageLogLevel) return "" return ..Log(messageCode, messageLogLevel, params...)_$c(13, 10)

Export.Routine:
Install do ##class(Port.Installer).Install() quit
Wizard do ##class(Port.Wizard).Start() quit

Class.name: Port.Project.Backup
Class.Description: This is an internal utility used to backup CSP files which is triggered whenever the user attempts to import a workspace that contains a 'public' folder.

Property.name: BackupDirectory
Property.Description: The directory where the affected items will be copied into.

Property.name: Logger
Property.Description: A reference for the logger used to display the current operation.

Property.name: IsRequired
Property.Description: An internal flag used to signal if the backup should be made.

Property.name: BackupList
Property.Description: A list of affected files that is used to rollback.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: set ..BackupDirectory = backupDir set ..Logger = ##class(Port.Logger).%New() quit $$$OK

Method.name: Create
Method.Description: Creates a backup from a list generated by the Importer. Everything affected will be put into the path provided by BackupDiretory, which is usually located at <workspace>/__backup__.

Method.name: Rollback
Method.Description: Undo the changes made by the importer copying the __backup__ directory back into the CSP directory.

Class.name: Port.Project.Base
Class.Description: This is the main class used to define a set of features that are shared by each type of utility.

Property.name: Logger
Property.Description: A reference for the utility that is used to display information regarding the current operation.

Property.name: Project
Property.Description: A reference for the current opened %Studio.Project.

Property.name: BasePath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace directory.

Property.name: IncPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'inc' directory.

Property.name: ClassPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'cls' directory.

Property.name: IntPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'int' directory.

Property.name: MacPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'mac' directory.

Property.name: PublicPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'public' directory.

Property.name: MvbPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'mvb' directory.

Property.name: MviPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'mvi' directory.

Property.name: BasPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'bas' directory.

Property.name: DfiPath
Property.Description: A string containing the workspace plus the 'dfi' directory.

Property.name: AffectedCount
Property.Description: Contains the count of items imported/exported.

Property.name: IsBatch
Property.Description: A flag that indicates if the user opted to import/export more than one item.

Property.name: Overwrite
Property.Description: A flag that signals the exporter/imported to overwrite every file/document regardless if they are up-to-date or not.

Property.name: LogLevel
Property.Description: An integer indicating the level of the logger, which is used to filter what kind of info should de display for the end-user.

Property.name: IgnoredPaths
Property.Description: A list of files that are ignored by the synchronizer utility.

Method.name: %OnNew
LogExclusive
Method.Description: Displays the message only if the configured log level is exactly the same on provided for this method.
Method.Implementation: if ..Logger.LogLevel '= logLevel quit "" quit ..Log(messageCode, logLevel, params...)

Method.name: Log
Method.Description: Displays the message if the configured log level is either the same or higher than the one provided for this method. This method won't break the line.
Method.Implementation: quit ..Logger.Log(messageCode, logLevel, params...)

Method.name: LogLine
Method.Description: Same as Log, but this will break into a new line.
Method.Implementation: quit ..Logger.LogLine(messageCode, logLevel, params...)

Method.name: LogExclusiveLine
Method.Description: Same as LogExclusive, but will break into a new line.
Method.Implementation: if ..Logger.LogLevel '= logLevel quit "" quit ..Logger.LogLine(message, logLevel, params...)

Method.name: GetProjectName
Method.Description: Returns the name of the project that is being used by the utility.
Method.Implementation: quit ..ProjectName

Method.name: Ignore
Method.Description: Adds a path to the IgnoredPaths list. Which is used by the Synchronizer to skip files.

Method.name: IsIgnored
Method.Description: This method is used by the Sychronizer to check if the file should be skipped or not.
Method.Implementation:
set key = "" set isIgnored = 0
for i=1:1:..IgnoredPaths.Count() { set path = ..IgnoredPaths.GetAt(i) set isIgnored = ((path = maybeIgnoredPath) || (maybeIgnoredPath [ path)) if isIgnored quit } quit isIgnored

Method.name: GetTypePath
Method.Description: Returns the current path for the 'type' and 'itemName' provided. This method is not intended to be used by the Synchronizer
Method.Implementation: if itemType = "CLS" quit ..ClassPath if itemType = "INT" quit ..IntPath if itemType = "INC" || (itemType = "MAC" && ($piece(itemName, ".", 2) = "INC")) { // InterSystems groups INC into MAC type, so we patch it checking the name instead. quit ..IncPath } if itemType = "MAC" quit ..MacPath if itemType = "CSP" quit ..PublicPath if itemType = "MVB" quit ..MvbPath if itemType = "MVI" quit ..MviPath if itemType = "BAS" quit ..BasPath if itemType = "DFI" quit ..DfiPath if itemType = "PKG" quit ..ClassPath quit ..PublicPath

Method.name: BuildTypePaths
Method.Description: Populates each path type property that is used to discover where the file is located.
Method.Implementation:
#define BuildTypedPath(%type) $$$NFN(workspacePath_"/"_%type)
set ..ClassPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("cls") set ..IntPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("int") set ..MacPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("mac") set ..IncPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("inc") set ..PublicPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("public") set ..MvbPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("mvb") set ..MviPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("mvi") set ..BasPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("bas") set ..DfiPath = $$$BuildTypedPath("dfi") quit $$$OK

Method.name: IsOutdated
Method.Description: Returns if the item is up-to-date to its equivalent file version.
Method.Implementation: quit ##class(Port.Util).IsOutdated(..GetProjectName(), current, external, isImport)

Class.name: Port.Project.Exporter
Class.Description: This is the utility used to export the source code to the workspace.

Property.name: ExportedPackages
Property.Description: A list of packages that are already exported, this is used to prevent items from the same package from being exported again.

Property.name: Synchronizer
Property.Description: A reference for the sychronizer, which keeps the workspace directory sync'ed with the project items.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation:
$$$QuitOnError(##super(path, logLevel))
if '$isobject(..Project) { set ..Project.Name = "null" throw ##class(%Exception.StatusException).CreateFromStatus($$$PERROR($$$ExportingProjectNotFound, ..Project.Name)) } set ..Synchronizer = ##class(Synchronizer).%New($this) return $$$OK

Method.name: Export
Method.Description: Exports the project to the provided workspace.

Method.name: ExportProjectItems
Method.Implementation: set sc = $$$OK set s = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() $$$QuitOnError(s.%PrepareClassQuery("%Studio.Project", "ProjectItemsList")) set r = s.%Execute(..Project.Name, 1) while r.%Next(.sc) { if $$$ISERR(sc) quit set itemName = r.%Get("Name") set itemType = r.%Get("Type") set sc = $$$ADDSC(sc, ..ExportItem(itemName, itemType)) } return sc

Method.name: ExportItem
Method.Description: Exports a single item from the project to the workspace.

Method.name: ExportPackage
Method.Description: Exports a class package and all its classes added by the project.

Method.name: ExportPublicFile
Method.Description: Exports a CSP-like file to the workspace's public folder. The CSP application name is mirrored into subfolders inside the public folder.

Method.name: ExportRoutine
Method.Description: Export a routine to the workspace, the path inside the workspace is taken from the type of routine to be exported.

Method.name: ExportClass
Method.Description: Export a class to the workspace's 'cls' folder. Each class package is treated like a subfolder.

Method.name: Reset
Method.Implementation: set i%ExportedPackages = "" do ..Synchronizer.Reset()

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation:
$$$QuitOnError(##super(inputPath, logLevel))
set ..BackupDirectory = $$$NFN(..BasePath_"/__backup__/") set ..Backup = ##class(Port.Project.Backup).%New(..BackupDirectory) set ..Backup.Logger = ..Logger
set i%ImportList = 0 set i%ItemsList = 0
if '$isobject(..Project) { set ..IsNewProject = 1 set ..Project = ##class(%Studio.Project).%New() set ..Project.Name = ..Project.Name } quit $$$OK

Method.name: EnqueueAll
Method.Implementation:
do ..ResetLists()
set sc = $$$OK for i = ..IncPath, ..IntPath, ..ClassPath, ..MacPath, ..BasPath, ..MviPath, ..MvbPath, ..DfiPath, ..PublicPath { set sc = ..EnqueueDirectory(i) if $$$ISERR(sc) quit } quit sc

Method.name: EnqueueItem
EnqueueDirectory
GetTypePriority
Method.Implementation: if type = "INC" quit 1 if type = "INT" quit 2 if type = "CLS" quit 3 if type = "MAC" quit 4 if type = "MVI" quit 5 if type = "MVB" quit 6 if type = "BAS" quit 7 if type = "DFI" quit 8 quit 9

Method.name: DescribeItem
Method.Implementation:
set fileName = ##class(%File).GetFilename(origin) set emptyName = ($piece(fileName, ".") = "") set pathType = ##class(Port.Util).GetPathType(origin)
set isOutdated = 1 set itemName = ##class(Port.Util).PathToItem(origin) set itemType = ##class(Port.Util).GetItemType(itemName) set priority = ..GetTypePriority(itemType)
if emptyName || (pathType '= itemType && (pathType '= "PUBLIC")) { set itemName = "" set itemType = "" set priority = -1 set isOutdated = 0 } elseif '..Overwrite { set isOutdated = ..IsOutdated(itemName, origin, 1) }
quit $$$OK

Method.name: ImportList
ImportType
Method.Implementation:
set sc = $$$OK if '$data(i%ImportList(group)) quit sc set itemType = $listget($$$ImportTypes, group, "CSP")
write ..LogExclusiveLine($$$ImportingType, 1, $$$GetGroupTypeDescription(itemType))
set itemName = "" for { quit:'$data(i%ImportList(group)) set itemName = $order(i%ImportList(group, itemType, itemName), 1, modifiedFilePath) quit:itemName=""
write ..LogExclusive($$$ImportingType, 2, $$$GetTypeDescription(itemType), itemName)
set sc = ..ImportFromExternalSource(itemName, modifiedFilePath, itemType) if $$$ISERR(sc) write ..LogExclusiveLine($$$Failed, 2) quit else write ..LogExclusiveLine($$$Done, 2) } quit sc

Method.name: ImportPartial
Import
ImportFromExternalSource
SynchronizeProject
ResetLists
Method.Implementation: kill i%ImportList, i%ItemsList set (i%ImportList, i%ItemsList) = 0

Method.name: InstantiateTool
Export
Method.Implementation: set exporter = ..InstantiateTool("E", outputPath, logLevel, .sc) $$$QuitOnError(sc) set exporter.Overwrite = force $$$QuitOnError(exporter.Ignore(ignoredPaths)) $$$QuitOnError(exporter.Export()) set projectName = exporter.GetProjectName() if exporter.AffectedCount > 0 { $$$QuitOnError(##class(Port.SourceControl.Log).LogChange(projectName, projectName_".PRJ")) } return $$$OK

Method.name: ExportToXML
Import
Method.Implementation:
set sc = $$$OK set importer = ..InstantiateTool("I", inputPath, logLevel, .sc) $$$QuitOnError(sc) $$$QuitOnError(importer.Ignore(ignoredPaths))
set importer.SkipBackup = skipBackup set importer.IsBatch = 1 set importer.Overwrite = overwrite set projectName = importer.GetProjectName()
$$$QuitOnError(importer.Import())
if importer.AffectedCount > 0 { $$$QuitOnError(##class(Port.SourceControl.Log).LogChange(projectName, projectName_".PRJ")) } return sc

Method.name: ImportPartial
Method.Implementation:
set importer = ..InstantiateTool("I", basePath, logLevel, .sc) $$$QuitOnError(sc) $$$QuitOnError(importer.Ignore(ignoredPaths))
set importer.LogLevel = logLevel set importer.SkipBackup = skipBackup set importer.Overwrite = 1
$$$QuitOnError(importer.ImportPartial(target, .importedList))
do ..LogFromImportList(importer.GetProjectName(), .importedList) return $$$OK

Method.name: RemoveInvalidItems
Method.Implementation: set project = ##class(%Studio.Project).%OpenId(projectName) $$$QuitOnError(project.Check()) $$$QuitOnError(project.%Save()) return $$$OK

Method.name: RemoveItemsByType
Method.Implementation:
set sc = $$$OK set project = ##class(%Studio.Project).%OpenId(projectName) set s = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() $$$QuitOnError(s.%PrepareClassQuery("%Studio.Project", "ProjectItemsList")) set r = s.%Execute(projectName)
while r.%Next() { set itemType = r.%Get("Type") set name = r.%Get("Name") if itemType = type { set items(name) = "" set sc = project.RemoveItem(name, itemType) if $$$ISERR(sc) quit } } $$$QuitOnError(project.%Save()) return sc

Method.name: ExportToXML
Method.Implementation:
set developmentXML = ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename(..BasePath_"/"_..Project.Name_".xml") set productionXML = ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename(..BasePath_"/"_..Project.Name_"-prod.xml") write ..LogLine($$$ExportingXML, 0, ..Project.Name) $$$QuitOnError(..Project.Export(developmentXML, qspec, justProject, errorlog, charset)) write ..LogLine($$$XMLExportedTo, 0, ..Project.Name, developmentXML)
do SanitizePackages(.items)
if $order(items("")) '= "" { $$$QuitOnError($System.OBJ.Export(.items, productionXML, qspec, errorlog, charset)) write ..LogLine($$$XMLExportedTo, 0, ..Project.Name, productionXML) }
quit $$$OK
SanitizePackages(items="") set sc = $$$OK set testPrefix = ##class(Port.Configuration).GetTestClassPrefix()
set s = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%New() do s.%PrepareClassQuery("%Studio.Project", "ProjectItemsList")
set r = s.%Execute(..Project.Name) while r.%Next() { set itemName = r.%Get("Name") set itemType = r.%Get("Type") if itemType '= "CLS" || (itemType = "CLS" && '($extract(itemName, 1, $length(testPrefix)) = testPrefix)) { set name = itemName set type = itemType do ##class(%Studio.Project).NormalizeName(.name, .type) if type = "CLS" || (type = "PKG") set name = name_"."_type set items(name) = "" } } quit

Method.name: Synchronize
Method.Implementation:
#define ProjectExists(%id) ##class(%Studio.Project).%ExistsId(%id) #define ItemExists(%id) ##class(%Studio.ProjectItem).%ExistsId(%id)
set sc = $$$OK if '$data(^Port.SourceControl.Projects) return sc
set global = "^Port.SourceControl.Projects" set q = $query(@global@("")) for { quit:q=""
set projectName = $qsubscript(q, 1) set type = $qsubscript(q, 2) set itemName = $qsubscript(q, 3)
if type '= "CLS" && (type '= "PRJ") set itemName = itemName_"."_type if type = "CSP" set itemName = $extract(itemName, 2, *) set itemId = projectName_"||"_itemName_"||"_type if '$$$ProjectExists(projectName) || '$$$ItemExists(itemId) { kill @q } set q = $query(@q, 1) } return $$$OK

Method.name: Flush
Method.Implementation: kill ^Port.SourceControl.Projects return $$$OK

Method.name: StartTask
Method.Implementation: set taskName = "Port Log Synchronizer for "_$namespace if ##class(%SYS.Task).FindId(taskName) return $$$OK set task = ##class(%SYS.Task).%New() set task.TimePeriod = 0 set task.Description = "Keeps the log synchronized with existing projects and files." set task.Name = taskName set task.TimePeriodEvery = 1 set task.DailyFrequency = 1 set task.DailyFrequencyTime = 0 set task.DailyStartTime = 28800 set task.DailyIncrement = 180 set task.NameSpace = $namespace set task.TaskClass = $classname($this) return task.%Save()

Method.name: RemoveTask
Method.Implementation:
#dim task as %SYS.Task
set name = "Port Log Synchronizer for "_$namespace set taskId = ##class(%SYS.Task).FindId(name)
if taskId = "" return $$$OK $$$QuitOnError(##class(%SYS.Task).Suspend(taskId, 2)) $$$QuitOnError(##class(%SYS.Task).%DeleteId(taskId)) return $$$OK

Method.name: OnTask
Method.Implementation: return ##class(Port.SourceControl.Log).Synchronize()

Method.name: CreateFauxItems
Method.Implementation:
#define TAB $char(9) #define GetAbsolutePath(%relative) ##class(%File).Normalize($System.Util.InstallDirectory, %relative) set sc = $$$OK
set fauxItems = 13 set fauxItems(1) = "Faux.Class.cls" set fauxItems(2) = "fauxjs.js" set fauxItems(3) = "fauxcss.css" set fauxItems(4) = "fauxinc.inc" set fauxItems(5) = "fauxmac.mac" set fauxItems(6) = "fauxint.int" set fauxItems(7) = "fauxmvi.mvi" set fauxItems(8) = "fauxmvb.mvb" set fauxItems(9) = "fauxbas.bas" set fauxItems(10) = "fauxdfi.dfi" set fauxItems(11) = "fauxcsp.csp" set fauxItems(12) = "fauxcsr.csr" set fauxItems(13) = "fauxhtml.html"
for i=1:1:fauxItems { set contentType = 0 set name = fauxItems(i) set ext = $piece(name, ".", *) set destination = name set absoluteFilePath = ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename(..FixtureDirectory_"/"_name) if '##class(%File).Exists(absoluteFilePath) continue if $lf($lfs("inc,mac,int,dfi,mvi,mvb,bas"), ext) { set file = ##class(%FileCharacterStream).%New() set file.Filename = absoluteFilePath if ##class(%RoutineMgr).Exists(name) { do ##class(%RoutineMgr).Delete(name) } set routine = ##class(%RoutineMgr).%OpenId(name) set sc = routine.Code.CopyFrom(file) if $$$ISERR(sc) quit set sc = routine.Code.%Save() if $$$ISERR(sc) quit set routine = "" set contentType = 1 } elseif ext = "cls" { set sc = ##class(%Compiler.UDL.TextServices).SetTextFromFile($namespace, ##class(%File).GetFilename(absoluteFilePath), absoluteFilePath) if $$$ISERR(sc) quit } else { set name = $extract($System.CSP.GetDefaultApp($namespace)_"/"_name, 2, *) set destination = ##class(Port.Project.Helper).CSPToAbsoluteAppPath(name) set sc = ##class(%File).CopyFile(absoluteFilePath, destination, 1, .o) if 'sc quit set contentType = 2 } set i%ItemsList = $increment(i%ItemsList) set i%ItemsList(destination) = contentType set file = "" } return sc

Method.name: GetWorkspaceNameFromAbsoluteItemPath
Method.Description: Returns the workspace folder name according to an absolute path. The name is matched from the directory part that is before the item type folder. E.g.: <workspace_name>/<item_type>/<item_filename>. If item_type is a known type, then it will be used as a pointer to find the workspace_name.
Method.Implementation:
set pathParts = $lfs(absolutePath, $$$Slash(absolutePath)) set workspaceName = ""
for i=1:1:$ll(pathParts) { set part = $lg(pathParts, i) if $lf($$$PathTypes, part) set workspaceName = $lg(pathParts, i - 1) quit } quit workspaceName

Method.name: GetWorkspaceFromItemPath
Method.Description: Returns the path that leads to the workspace folder, excluding any folder that is part of it.

Method.name: GetItemType
Method.Description: Retrieves the extension from the itemName. If the extension matches none, then attempt to find out if the extension is actually a package. Otherwise assume that the extension is defined from a custom file.
Method.Implementation:
set ext = $$$ucase($piece(itemName, ".", *)) set slash = $$$PathSlash(itemName)
if itemName [ slash quit "CSP" if $lf($$$RoutineExtensions, "."_ext) || (ext = "CLS") || (ext = "PRJ") return ext
if 'checkPackageExists || (checkPackageExists && ..IsPackage(itemName)) { quit "PKG" } quit ext

Method.name: IsPackage
Method.Description: Checks if the itemName is actually a package. Returns 1 if yes otherwise 0.
Method.Implementation:
if itemName = "" return 0 if $get(^oddPKG($$$ucase(itemName))) '= "" quit 1 if ##class(%Dictionary.PackageDefinition).%ExistsId(itemName) quit 1 do $System.OBJ.GetPackageList(.l, itemName) if $data(l) quit 1
quit 0

Method.name: GetWorkspaceBasedItemPath
Method.Description: Translates an item name into a workspace path.
Method.Implementation: quit ..ItemToPath(itemName, $$$NFN(##class(Port.Configuration).GetWorkspace(project)))

Method.name: ItemToPath
Method.Description: Translates the item name into an item path which represents the location to where the file source is located.

Method.name: PathToItem
Method.Description: Translates an absolute item path into its item format.
Method.Implementation:
set isPackage = 0 if sourcePath [ "." set type = $piece(sourcePath, ".", *) else set type = "cls" set isPackage = 1
set uppercaseType = $$$ucase(type)
set sourcePath = $$$NFN(sourcePath) set slash = $$$Slash(sourcePath)
if $lf($$$RoutineExtensions, "."_uppercaseType) || (uppercaseType = "CLS") { set item = $replace($piece($$$LPadProvidedSlash(sourcePath, slash), slash_type_slash, 2, *), slash, ".") if isPackage set $piece(item, ".", *+1) = "pkg" quit item }
set item = ..GetItemFromCSPPath(sourcePath, namespace) quit item

Method.Description: Extracts the portion of the folder that represents the source type.

Method.Description: Resolves item name into a qualified id that can be manipulated by the %Studio.Project API.

Method.Implementation: set slash = $$$Slash(physicalPath) quit $replace($extract(physicalPath, $find(physicalPath, slash_"public"_slash), *), "\", "/")

Method.name: IsRoutine
Method.Implementation:
set extension = ..GetItemType(itemName)
if extension = "MAC" || (extension = "INT") || (extension = "MVB") || (extension = "MVI") || (extension = "BAS") || (extension = "INC") || (extension = "DFI") { return 1 } return 0

Method.name: ClassToFile
Method.Implementation: set cls = $case(appendCLS, 1: ".cls", : "") quit $replace(className, ".", $$$OSSlash)_cls

Method.name: FileToClass
Method.Implementation: set slash = $$$Slash(path) set path = $$$NFN(path) set fileName = ##class(%File).GetFilename(path) set contextPath = $extract(path, $find(path, slash_"cls") + 1, ($length(path) - 1) - 3) return $replace(contextPath, slash, ".")

Method.name: ExistsInProject
ListConflicts
Method.Implementation:
new $namespace set $namespace = namespace
do ##class(%Studio.Project).NormalizeName(.name, .type) &sql( SELECT LIST(DISTINCT P.NAME) INTO :conflicts FROM %STUDIO.PROJECTITEM PI LEFT OUTER JOIN %STUDIO.PROJECT P ON P.ID = PI.Project WHERE P.NAME <> :projectName AND ( -- This deals with common cases. (:type NOT IN ('PKG', 'CLS') AND PI.NAME = :name) OR -- This deals with cases where a project is trying to add a package that is -- depended by another class in another project. (:type = 'PKG' AND PI.NAME %STARTSWITH :name) OR -- This deals with attempts to add classes that are owned by another project's -- package. (:type = 'CLS' AND PI.NAME = :name) ) ) return $lfs(conflicts)

Method.name: Start
Method.Implementation:
set validChoices = $listbuild(1,2,3,4,5) set invalidChoice = 1 set choice = ""
if 'hideIntroduction { write !, $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWWelcome) }
while invalidChoice { if invalidChoice && (choice '= "") write $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWInvalidChoice) do Menu }
if choice = 1 return ..StartWorkspaceConfigAssistant() quit if choice = 2 return ..StartTestConfigAssistant() quit if choice = 3 return ..StartAutoExportXMLConfigAssistant() quit if choice = 4 return ..StartLogLevelConfigAssistant() quit if choice = 5 write !, $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWBye) return $$$OK
Menu set choice = "" write !!, $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWChoiceQuestion), !!
write $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWManageWorkspaceChoice), ! write $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWManageChangeTestSettingsChoice), ! write $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWToggleAutoExportChoice), ! write $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWSetLogLevelChoice), ! write $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWExit), !!
write $$$FormatWizardMsg($$$PCWChoicePrompt)
read choice write ! set invalidChoice = ($listfind(validChoices, choice) = 0) quit
